subject: [Radiance-general] pinterp missing -vts [was: vta 2 vth]
body:
Hi Thomas,

I just gave it a go with the latest HEAD, and it seems to be working
just fine.  I don't know what might be amiss with your installation,
but the main disto. seems OK.

It's a good idea to add an example of this to the pinterp man page.
Will do so for the next release.

Best,
-Greg
